thread.title: Russia’s Olympic Committee Reinstated by IOC

author: Rachel Bachman
title: Russia’s Olympic Committee Reinstated by IOC
text:
The International Olympic Committee reinstated the Russian Olympic Committee on Wednesday after the IOC confirmed that all remaining drug tests for Russian athletes competing at the Pyeongchang Games were negative.
An IOC statement confirmed that “as stated in the Executive Board decision of 25th February the suspension of the Russian Olympic Committee is automatically lifted with immediate effect.”
In...
